data.text:
UN Peacekeepers come from different countries, cultures & backgrounds --
but share a common purpose to protect the most vulnerable. https://t.co/lZYeCp9I0z  #ServingForPeace https://t.co/EMXoVav7Fm
See how UNHQ in NYC became an outdoor yoga studio & helped promote #GlobalGoals on Thursday's Int'l #YogaDay! https://t.co/fTuRVlLKyI https://t.co/p45vIw7l8r

Wildlife populations are half the size they were 50 years ago.  
The @undp-supported #LionsShare initiative aims to change this alarming trend: https://t.co/9hBWFlEocl https://t.co/4VNXI2IidH

How is #YogaDay connected to #GlobalGoals? Practicing yoga can contribute to good health & well being. Hundreds of people filled the North Lawn of UN Headquarters to celebrate #YogaDay!

https://t.co/ClSJ6KBjuI https://t.co/Pnk6QhzZWW
#TBT to UN Conference on Peaceful Uses of Outer Space in 1968. 50 years later, follow @UNOOSA for updates from #UNISPACE50 happening this week: https://t.co/JWljKovVdD https://t.co/8XmcIWmjmz
🧘‍♀️ On Thursday's Int'l #YogaDay, see how the #GlobalGoals aim to achieve health & well-being for everyone in the 🌍: https://t.co/JTMj28ANAM 🧘‍♂️ https://t.co/KnhG7p69F8

How can governments use innovation to achieve the #GlobalGoals and improve the lives of society's most vulnerable? Follow the UN Public Service Forum to find out: https://t.co/TiJspXGGgG #UNPSA2018 https://t.co/s0aYsjKZq2

The UN Human Rights Council appoints independent experts to report & advise on human rights through country visits, bringing attention to individual cases of abuse, raising public awareness & much more: https://t.co/eFjDGrSh9M https://t.co/MRgFNMVHQd
🧘‍♀️ Thursday is #YogaDay! 🧘‍♂️ Yoga brings thought & action together in harmony and helps spiritual & mental well-being. https://t.co/UPUoR4xiLZ https://t.co/EdF9v3PeGg
Climate change, conflict and poverty are challenging countries’ efforts to achieve the #GlobalGoals, says new UN report: https://t.co/Z9GDbo6nKd https://t.co/Kbq3iktz2z
"On #WorldRefugeeDay, we must all think about what more we can do to help. The answer begins with unity and solidarity." -- @antonioguterres https://t.co/IhSRlQ9ecH https://t.co/DUEhie6uEr
UN Police is essential for preventing conflict & building peace. @UNPOL Chiefs of Police Summit takes place this week at UNHQ: https://t.co/7Ak0Z2ZWaj https://t.co/i3S29mvqDm

"Space and science give superpowers"

Find out more about what space has to offer from experts at @UNOOSA's #UNISPACE50: https://t.co/hQcTvY665a https://t.co/V0rqyGQKyV

85% of the world's @refugees are hosted in developing countries.
Watch to find out more on #WorldRefugeeDay ⬇️ https://t.co/ACGny90f3S https://t.co/PNqWiEq0Io

UN Peacekeepers leave their families behind and travel to some of the most hostile environments on the 🌍 to help others. More on the brave men & women #ServingForPeace ➡️ https://t.co/lZYeCp9I0z https://t.co/4t7oc3ZgGb

Every 2 seconds, a person is forced to flee their home.
52% of @refugees around the 🌍 are children.

On Wednesday's #WorldRefugeeDay & every day, show you stand #WithRefugees: https://t.co/8289anttNU https://t.co/MfRRRm1INT
The Human Rights Council reviews the human rights records of all 193 UN member countries — the only process of this kind in existence. More on @UN_HRC: https://t.co/gpZHzcxGGX https://t.co/ystL9kz82L

"Women are essential peacebuilders & essential for durable peace." -- @antonioguterres highlights the role of women in mediation at #OsloForum: 
https://t.co/rjpC6D7w3J https://t.co/WJdH3reKiX

"As the attack on the multilateral system & its rules, including most especially int'l human rights law, intensifies, so too will the risk increase of further mischief on a grander scale." - @UNhumanrights chief Zeid to Human Rights Council on Monday https://t.co/o7x8AcGjng https://t.co/Pp5OSORsNq
The Human Rights Council is responsible for promoting & protecting the human rights of all people all over the 🌎. More on @UN_HRC: https://t.co/eQAhSgKfzD https://t.co/EODHuo1t8n

With 68.5M people forced to flee their homes, the world’s displaced population reached a new high in 2017. Find out more in latest @refugees report: https://t.co/ACGny8IDFi #WithRefugees https://t.co/pyZJ80Ehta
On Tuesday's Int'l Day to #EndRapeInWar & every day, @UN_Women supports courageous survivors seeking justice: https://t.co/Zy2zjDZgT0 https://t.co/ggO7HGXKNi
On Tuesday's Int'l Day to #EndRapeInWar, find out how the UN is helping Rohingya survivors of sexual violence through women-friendly spaces &more: https://t.co/DgiboLirK4 https://t.co/Hfd4sEEuws
Meet military & police officers from Togo #ServingForPeace with @UNPeacekeeping around the 🌎 in our latest @instagram story ➡️ https://t.co/UH4OQC7zhU https://t.co/bDPtIR6spu
#UNISPACE50 started Monday in @UN_Vienna. More details on 50th anniversary of UN Conference on Exploration & Peaceful Uses of Outer Space here: https://t.co/p9yYxWKXCQ https://t.co/4eXKXkWDdr

"Only by speaking out can we begin to combat the growing menace of chauvinistic nationalism that stalks our future." -- @UNHumanRights chief Zeid in his last global update to the Human Rights Council. https://t.co/TwzZXWu95K https://t.co/LnqMzUfRle

"The prevention of sexual violence must remain one of our highest priorities."
-- @antonioguterres. 

Tuesday is Int'l Day to #EndRapeInWar: https://t.co/mNJovdDCL8 https://t.co/SrUEEBBt8d

"Children must not be traumatized by being separated from their parents. Family unity must be preserved." -- @UN_Spokesperson for @antonioguterres
https://t.co/DDD5T0XTfB https://t.co/Y3uIBQLFUg

"Small arms control is a prerequisite for stability & conflict prevention" -- @antonioguterres' message to #RevCon3 on tackling illicit trade in small arms. Details: https://t.co/BXPc4UHXvD https://t.co/piKNb0vs1F

Togo provides military & police officers to 7 @UNPeacekeeping missions around the 🌍. We thank these brave men & women for their service & sacrifice. https://t.co/lZYeCp9I0z #ServingForPeace https://t.co/Oug8CM1tVv

"In the United States, I am deeply concerned by recently adopted policies which punish children for their parents’ actions." -- @UNHumanRights chief Zeid on forcible separation of nearly 2000 children from their parents in past 6 weeks: https://t.co/TwzZXWcyec https://t.co/5zCIUQ0VCf

“This is the worst devastation I have seen in all my years with UNHCR.”
--@Refugees Special Envoy Angelina Jolie met displaced families in West Mosul as they return to the city after its liberation from ISIS https://t.co/Nggr4seQ3E https://t.co/7pvUTubRI1
Starts this week @UN_Vienna: Committee on the Peaceful Uses of Outer Space. Follow @UNOOSA & see: https://t.co/T9Hx68ayEL #COPUOS https://t.co/vDejJUu4gu
Monday is Sustainable Gastronomy Day! Get ideas on how to live sustainably & help achieve the #GlobalGoals: https://t.co/WdAk3YdLt8 https://t.co/sLTDJKf5ng
Starts this week @UNGeneva: Human Rights Council, 38th session (through 6 July): https://t.co/fP2IyiO798 https://t.co/r0yIa6oGxb
What's happening this week at the UN? #WorldRefugeeDay, #UNSPACE50, Int'l #YogaDay & more. List of events here: https://t.co/pqHtHL0Nb8 https://t.co/qrG6eVLaqf

"They can just see from the faces of the girls who are pregnant that something terrible happened."

Rohingya refugees are among the latest victims of sexual violence in conflict.  @UN_News_Centre special report: https://t.co/013NUr2pQv
On Monday's Sustainable Gastronomy Day, here are tips from @FAO on how to reduce food waste: https://t.co/Ewfm28Z5s2 #GlobalGoals https://t.co/hmZnGVdDVO
Interested in working at the UN? The Young Professionals Programme is now open for applications until 9 August. @UN_Careers has more details: https://t.co/yBgBGTqtOP https://t.co/GMmAoFLDn8

We must do far more to recognize the immense value of healthy & productive land in strengthening the resilience of the world’s poorest communities -- @antonioguterres on World Day to Combat Desertification https://t.co/SxTeIcVDI0 https://t.co/yPIJ5geWfw

.@jilly_peppa & @NyleDiMarco came to the UN to talk about the rights of people with disabilities. Have a look behind-the-scenes in our latest @instagram story ➡️ https://t.co/UH4OQBPYqm https://t.co/hUNsAupF6z
Sustainable living helps reduce poverty and food loss. More on Sunday's World Day to Combat Desertification & Drought: https://t.co/rXOFE2Nny8 #2018WDCD https://t.co/XMVFwGQ5Cd

"It is clear that clean energy makes climate sense. But it also makes economic sense." -- @antonioguterres
Here's how sustainable energy transforms lives, economies & the planet: https://t.co/nj3L8qbm9u #GlobalGoals https://t.co/hBYToC3qPR

#LGBTI RIGHTS = HUMAN RIGHTS

Join @free_equal & support fair treatment of lesbian, gay, bi, trans & intersex people: https://t.co/Ljui9GqDYQ #PrideMonth https://t.co/bY8rFoYd4f

Sustainable land management helps: 
➡️ recover degraded land 🌱
➡️ tackle climate change 🌍
➡️ conserve biodiversity 🐨🐯🐸
➡️ improve food security🍲
More on Sunday's World Day to Combat Desertification & Drought: https://t.co/rXOFE2vM9y #2018WDCD https://t.co/t1DXI0FNL4

As many people celebrate #FathersDay, share a Super Dad tip with @UNICEF! Here are some parenting tips from around the world showing #EarlyMomentsMatter ➡️ https://t.co/tNG6Vuj93m https://t.co/i2BuBSWPEa

Separating children from their families leaves them more vulnerable to exploitation & abuse. Regardless of immigration status, children are children first. They must be protected. More via @UNICEFUSA ⬇️

https://t.co/lTZcfcKPMB
Saturday's Int'l Day of #FamilyRemittances highlights the financial contribution of migrant workers to their families & communities back home. https://t.co/ALgYm5jCmo https://t.co/ZVy177URvm

The majority of migrants work legally, contributing to both their home & host countries. More #ForMigration facts & figures on Saturday's Int'l #FamilyRemittances Day: https://t.co/d3Ln6eVhYK https://t.co/6Rphh8wQWC

Space-based technologies like satellites can help us protect our environment. 
Follow @UNOOSA for more space facts ahead of #UNISPACE50. https://t.co/vHQssz3YpL https://t.co/z16j64oO8E
The #GlobalGoals are "a summons to inter-generational solidarity," writes @antonioguterres in an op-ed for Saturday's #ImpactJournalism Day: https://t.co/3pJ2akKZ2h https://t.co/fHc7YoTe7b

1 in 7 people in the world either send money home or receive it --  a critical lifeline for millions of households. More on Saturday's Int'l Day of #FamilyRemittances: https://t.co/ALgYm5BdKY https://t.co/DAkFsYDf25

#LoveIsLove! This #PrideMonth, support fair treatment of lesbian, gay, bi, trans & intersex people and join UN @free_equal in the fight against transphobia & homophobia: https://t.co/Ljui9G92Ag https://t.co/s8g4mJnCeN

#WorldCup fever has reached the UN! Delegates from around the 🌎 came together at UNHQ to celebrate the “beautiful game". ⚽
Here's how sport can help achieve the #GlobalGoals: https://t.co/Tvxcci5d3e https://t.co/WYCSUYzwnG
1 in 6 people aged 60 years+ experienced some form of abuse during the past year. More from @WHO on Friday's World Elder Abuse Awareness Day: https://t.co/r1cM9OwNYa https://t.co/Ss4J6wmibA

“I strongly believe that the elements of a potential deal are now discernible through the haze & dust of war.”
— @UNAMAnews chief Tadamichi Yamamoto says a window for peace may be opening in Afghanistan. 
https://t.co/dSUbqpKuAh

“The health volunteer saved my life” – 23-year old Khin was suffering birth complications in Myanmar, when a @UNFPA volunteer came to help her & her baby. https://t.co/fpzGd9gcJr via @UNFPAMMR https://t.co/I1OaGXAw6K
Say no to ageism & help achieve the #GlobalGoals on Friday's World Elder Abuse Awareness Day and every day ➡️ https://t.co/fRqpuj1y4G https://t.co/PeKaMnfYEp
Efficient use of clean energy helps protect the environment and tackle global challenges. Here's what you can do: https://t.co/kYprx2h7Dz  #GlobalGoals https://t.co/EvTe8xxUx5
#EidMubarak! Wishing all our followers who are celebrating a happy and peaceful #EidAlFitr. https://t.co/43hgUfvh9e
On Friday's World Elder Abuse Awareness Day, raise your voice against mistreatment of our older generations: https://t.co/a7LMPMJ1Tr https://t.co/85TTBT6G5l
The #WorldCup kicked off at the UN with Team Security Council & @antonioguterres as referee in the Council chamber -- displaying some friendly competition! ⚽ https://t.co/5UDEwEAgzx

"I want to play. I want to be happy."

Kids and families displaced by the conflict in Syria share their wishes for #EidAlFitr. See what the UN is doing to help them: https://t.co/zsuUacvHAQ https://t.co/6CFubH39Ug
On Thursday's World Blood Donor Day, consider giving the valuable gift of blood to those most in need: https://t.co/ITmgQjpLuF #GiveBlood. Give now. Give often. https://t.co/R72mE9TujQ
Starts Thursday at UNHQ: elections of Human Rights Committee independent experts: https://t.co/8D7G2zuVmZ https://t.co/DHYCT1I2wi

Blood transfusions can save lives but adequate supply of safe blood can only be assured through regular & voluntary donations. Thursday is World #GiveBlood Day: https://t.co/ITmgQjHmmd https://t.co/enX65tdCfU

#UNGA elected new @UNECOSOC members on Wednesday for 3-yr term starting 2019: Angola, Armenia, Brazil, Canada, Egypt, Ethiopia, Iran, Jamaica, Kenya, Luxembourg, Mali, Netherlands, Pakistan, Paraguay, Saudi Arabia, Turkmenistan, Ukraine, USA https://t.co/W6go4n8Huq https://t.co/gwKDmBokt1

Every few seconds, someone, somewhere, needs blood.
On Thursday's World Blood Donor Day & every day, be there for someone else: #GiveBlood. Share life. https://t.co/NXzqOApswN https://t.co/zP5mmXXmwR
Yemen: Military escalation will have serious consequences for millions of civilians in an already dire situation -- UN Special Envoy: https://t.co/p2FuCHMXjA https://t.co/KePcqjajji
#UNGA adopts resolution on Protection of the Palestinian civilian population with vote of 120 countries in favour; 8 against; and 45 abstentions. https://t.co/COtk2FGIlX https://t.co/nl94JKJTxc

Every year, thousands of people drown at sea or perish in deserts because of smugglers who promised an easy journey. Find out what @UNODC is doing to tackle #MigrantSmuggling: https://t.co/zvq8fY1nTv https://t.co/zItCh1Ebu8
Watch live now: #UNGA resumes 10th Emergency Special Session on "Illegal Israeli actions in Occupied East Jerusalem and the rest of the Occupied Palestinian Territory" https://t.co/acHtWpDLfP
Wednesday #UNGA will hold an Emergency Special Session on Middle East. Info on sessions based on the "Uniting for Peace" resolution here: https://t.co/EVQ5Ny1KwM https://t.co/kc2VPzyw0g

Int'l Albinism Awareness Day is an opportunity to declare solidarity with people with albinism & strive together so those who are often left furthest behind are able to live free from discrimination & fear -- @antonioguterres https://t.co/LBuQTkXPFP https://t.co/obCPiOyb89

"We must renew our focus and shared commitment to a world free of AIDS. The pandemic is not over, but it can be. We must all do our part." -- @antonioguterres https://t.co/gI827UwPMy https://t.co/5QcXwx471u
On Tuesday's Int'l Albinism Awareness Day, #StandUp4HumanRights because people with albinism should not face discrimination. https://t.co/epMZMnjN1J  #NotGhosts https://t.co/cZWBdqvxIj
“True peace requires standing up for the human rights of all the world’s people.” -- @antonioguterres marking 100-day countdown to #PeaceDay https://t.co/vHeZcfsMS6 https://t.co/VwcRlOJh3C
No one should be marginalized because of physical appearance. Find out more on Wednesday's Int'l Albinism Awareness Day: https://t.co/YAqHEKC6mC  #NotGhosts https://t.co/jnK30klMvZ

Take a closer look at timeline of recent diplomatic efforts ahead of the #SingaporeSummit & UN humanitarian work in Democratic People’s Republic of Korea: https://t.co/R6KpaVSyih https://t.co/LXft3jshs2

#TourTuesday: A resident peahen walks through wildflowers at Palais des Nations, home to the UN in Geneva. Take a tour to see peacocks roam freely at @UNGeneva 👉 https://t.co/ZyPJpV3Kjc https://t.co/fvn6jVZhWk

152 million children around the 🌍 are victims of child labour.
On Tuesday's #NoChildLabour Day, find out about efforts to end this abuse of children's rights: https://t.co/7RJv5VgTI0 https://t.co/4jXBXFnnUd
"Upholding the rights of people with disabilities is a moral imperative." -- @antonioguterres at  #COSP11 disability conference https://t.co/4JkR6CGV0L https://t.co/YSSZ3QrlGy

More than 1 billion people live with some kind of disability. 
Countries meet at  #COSP11 disability conference this week to ensure that no one gets left behind: https://t.co/BdPp4ySm1h #GlobalGoals https://t.co/XqAOaqENvj
What is child labour and what can you do to help eradicate it? Take a closer look on Tuesday's #NoChildLabour Day: https://t.co/7RJv5VgTI0 https://t.co/cV6HMd2fWf

"The moon belongs to everyone..."

Did you know that no part of outer space can be appropriated by any one country? 

Follow @UNOOSA for more space facts ahead of #UNISPACE50 celebration. https://t.co/CkO2bPQtpp https://t.co/lpwWLy7nW1
Urgent action is needed to ensure no child under the age of 18 is forced into child labour. Get more info on Tuesday's #NoChildLabour Day from @ILO : https://t.co/n0CMHy1S0J https://t.co/doOny9vBcy

I hope all parties will seize this opportunity to support a peaceful, prosperous, secure & verifiably denuclearized Korean Peninsula. -- @antonioguterres on #SingaporeSummit: https://t.co/KsmnhqqBaJ https://t.co/BWla6GZrRI
🎶 at UNHQ: @antonioguterres joined a performance of traditional songs at Portuguese cultural event on Monday. 🎧⬇️ https://t.co/05vSNfOQPL

1.5M+ people from Venezuela have left for neighbouring countries & beyond.
See how Brazil is helping relocate the most vulnerable with UN support 👇 https://t.co/O8psyFBqqq https://t.co/n8td0HoMTY
#Aquarius: @antonioguterres appeals for respect for international refugee law regarding stranded rescue ship. https://t.co/KsmnhqqBaJ https://t.co/Yh61khUNtG

The world is closely watching what will take place in Singapore in a few hours’ time.  

I commend the leaders of the Democratic People’s Republic of Korea & the United States for pursuing a diplomatic solution. 
-@antonioguterres #SingaporeSummit https://t.co/il6BOAfaAW
Peace and verifiable denuclearization must remain the clear and shared goal. The road ahead will require cooperation, compromise and a common cause. - @antonioguterres https://t.co/MdIuPSj9U2
Starts Monday in NYC: Conference of the States Parties to the Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities [12-14 June]. https://t.co/FlOoVUlx3F  #COSP11 https://t.co/Q1VFRQp7fw
Starts Monday in NYC: meeting of States parties to UN Convention on the Law of the Sea: https://t.co/E3fWSD9sfz
What's happening this week at the UN? #NoChildLabour Day, World #GiveBlood Day, Albinism Awareness Day & more. List of events here: https://t.co/yNVsV8fywe https://t.co/eBpwSovmFz
Meet the @WFP team from South Sudan managing 31 ✈️s & thousands of airdrops of food every year. https://t.co/X4YUVobmI8 via @WFPlogistics #ZeroHunger https://t.co/3GitmgthbB
"Be the Change" was last week's motto at UNHQ in NYC. Find out how UN colleagues supported the #GlobalGoals in our latest @instagram story ➡️https://t.co/UH4OQC7zhU https://t.co/Q49YPriKT0

🚰 Access to safe drinking water is a basic human right & essential for health. The #GlobalGoals aim to bring safe water to everyone. 💧 #EveryDrop counts! https://t.co/6DwQJNQyFj https://t.co/oxc9kotIT2

#LGBTI rights = human rights

This #PrideMonth join UN @free_equal in the fight against transphobia & homophobia: https://t.co/Ljui9G92Ag https://t.co/Ub6evujTyO

"If there’s anyone left behind, it is women & girls in rural areas. We want to take those at the back of the line to the front of the line." -- @phumzileunwomen

More in @africarenewal's interview with the @UN_Women chief: https://t.co/NN7b9DB4bW https://t.co/slqDZcKlTr
